component.name: Goop2
component.summary: Ephemeral Web - peer-to-peer presence-based web system

description.p: Goop2 is a free, peer-to-peer, presence-based web system for small, personal websites. Each peer is a self-contained node with its own identity, content, and optional local web UI.
Peers discover each other via mDNS on the local network and through a rendezvous server for wide-area connectivity. Content is ephemeral and only available while the peer is online.
The application is free to use. An optional credit system allows rendezvous operators to offer premium templates through a built-in template store.
